tourBios.curYrHigh: Rejoined PGA TOUR Latinoamérica by sharing runner-up honors at the Sebring, FL Q-School in January. Posted four sub-par rounds to finish two strokes behind medalist Corey Conners.
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Played the eGolf Tour and Open Golf Atlanta… Won the Greater Cedar Rapids Open in wire-to-wire fashion. Finished at 18-under at Hunters Ridge GC to win by four over Adam Schenk.

2014: Joined PGA TOUR Latinoamérica with a T23 finish at the Sebring, FL Q-School in January… Had one top-25 and three cuts made in 12 Tour starts to finish the season ranked 135th on the Order of Merit… His best finish was T14 at the 56th Abierto Mexicano in Mexico City, where he carded a season low 65 on the third round in October.

2010-2013: Played Open Golf Atlanta (2010-2015) and NGA Hooters Tour (2011-2013)

2009: As an amateur he missed the cut at the Chattanooga Classic on his first start on the Web.com Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played college golf for the University of Southern Mississippi, where he was named twice a Scholar All-American… Named to the Conference USA All-Academic Team four times… 2004 State Champion while attending Hixson HS in Hixson, TN.
tourBios.personal: A talkative person, says he would be doing something that involves talking if he weren't a professional golfer… His earliest golf memory is trading three pacifiers for his first golf club at the age of 2… His biggest thrill in golf in playing with his son… “Relentless” by Tim Grover is his favorite book… Roger Federer is his favorite athlete outside of golf… Says Montevideo, Uruguay is his favorite place in Latin America… His bucket list includes “touching every continent.”… Twitter name is @PaulApyan
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 2-11 at 2016 Q-School (exempt to midseason reshuffle)

tourBios.curYearHigh: Rejoined PGA TOUR Latinoamérica by sharing runner-up honors at the Sebring, FL Q-School in January. Posted four sub-par rounds to finish two strokes behind medalist Corey Conners.
